name: Tickle Monster vs Suits
description:
You're the TICKLE MONSTER!

You tickle kids to ensure they are raised with proper amounts of fun!

Use ARROWS to move and SPACE to tickle!
(and ENTER to get into main menu in case you're stuck on title screen :))

Beware - if you give them wrong amount of fun, they turn into fun hating grown ups! Don't let them catch you!

So who's got tickles?

Made for Ludum Dare 33

See also my joke entry: Flappy Monster
